intro: Austrosteenisia glabristyla, commonly known as the smooth-stemmed evergreen, is a shrub native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its dense, compact growth habit. The plant features smooth, greyish-brown stems and lance-shaped leaves that are leathery and glossy. Its flowers are small and typically white or pale pink, arranged in dense clusters. Austrosteenisia glabristyla is well adapted to dry, sandy soils and is often found in fynbos vegetation.
